title: How much has technology changed over the past few years? - Quora

response.answer_text: In my area of perpetual motion machines, there was basically one good experiment 5 years ago:  The Successful Over-Unity Experiment 1. Heck, Visual Education Project wasn’t picking up until around 2014. Even now in July 2018 they seemingly have not modeled my best devices. Anyway, there have been many experiments during the 2014 - 2018 time-period which make it more abundantly clear that perpetual motion is a real possibility. Promising Perpetual Motion Research
